Plot: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.
Title: Spawn
Writer: Todd McFarlane (comic book), Alan B. McElroy (screen story), Mark A.Z. Dippé (screen story), Alan B. McElroy (screenplay)
Actors: Michael Jai White, John Leguizamo, Martin Sheen, Theresa Randle
tomatoConsensus: Spawn is an overbearing, over-violent film that adds little to the comic book adaptation genre.
